attributes.action: The people should be able to force a General Election via majority petition.
attributes.additional_details: Because I feel that the current government is not running the country in the best interest of the nation or its people and so aren't acting in a democratic way.
attributes.background: I want the government to be more accountable for their actions, and to be asked to step down by the people if they fail in their running of the country.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign:

Allow civilians a vote of no confidence in the government or a minister

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/650340
